parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the sliding door can cause inconvenience and potentially lead to accidents if the door opens or closes unexpectedly while driving.
symptoms: The rear passenger's side sliding door fails to fully open upon entering or exiting the vehicle
the "Passenger's Sliding Door Failure" message is displayed on the instrument panel.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Electrical system failures can cause a range of safety issues, including loss of power, failure of safety systems, and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: The vehicle loses power while driving
the battery dies repeatedly
the alternator shows a constant 14.3-volt charge when running
the battery light blinks on the dashboard
the vehicle's safety systems report errors
including air bags
ABS brakes
high beams
traction control
blind spot detection
and parking sensors.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the VSA modulator can cause a range of safety issues, including loss of power, failure of safety systems, and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: The VSA modulator fails repeatedly
causing errors in safety systems
including air bags
ABS brakes
high beams
traction control
blind spot detection
and parking sensors
the power sliding passenger doors and tailgate will not open
even manually.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the infotainment system can cause distraction and potentially lead to accidents.
symptoms: The infotainment system turns off stating "network connection lost"
the speakers make a loud crackling sound that cannot be controlled with the volume button
the blindspot monitor and back-up camera stop functioning.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of manufacturers to address recall issues can cause a range of safety issues, including loss of power, failure of safety systems, and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: The manufacturer fails to provide a solution for a recall
the dealership refuses to fix the recall issue without payment for diagnostics
the contact is referred to the NHTSA Hotline for assistance.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The vehicle's engine may turn off unexpectedly at stops, requiring the driver to restart the engine, which can lead to accidents or inconvenience.
symptoms: The car turns off completely at a stop
requiring multiple restarts
displaying warnings such as "Auto Engine Idle Stop System Problem" and "Charging System Problem".

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Defective Replacement Parts (Driver Side View Mirror, Rear View Mirror)
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Distorted or defective replacement parts can cause safety concerns, such as impaired visibility, and may lead to accidents.
symptoms: Distorted
blurred
wavy
or double images in the driver side view mirror
rear view mirror falls apart and hangs down
causing hazardous conditions while driving.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Sudden and unexpected windshield cracking can cause safety risks, obstruct driver visibility, and lead to accidents.
symptoms: Front windshield cracks on its own
without any apparent cause or external impact.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Sudden and unexpected sunroof explosion can cause safety risks, obstruct driver visibility, and lead to accidents.
symptoms: Sunroof explodes and shatters while driving
without any apparent cause or external impact.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Unpredictable and sudden rear lift gate closure can cause physical harm to individuals and lead to accidents.
symptoms: Rear lift gate opens and then suddenly closes with loud beeping
without warning
and can hit individuals.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Unusual engine noise can be a sign of a underlying problem, potentially leading to engine failure or other safety issues.
symptoms: Cracking noise in the engine at low speed
similar to a video shared by the complainant.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: False Activation of Automatic Emergency Braking and Collision Mitigation Systems
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The false activation of automatic emergency braking and collision mitigation systems can cause sudden and unexpected slowing or stopping of the vehicle, increasing the risk of rear-end collisions and accidents.
symptoms: The vehicle suddenly and unexpectedly brakes or slows down
the BRAKE SYSTEM LIGHT illuminates
the forward collision warning alarm sounds
the adaptive cruise control malfunctions
the collision mitigation system faults
and the road departure mitigation system becomes inoperative.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Radar Obstruction and Malfunctioning Driver Assist Systems
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunctioning of driver assist systems, including adaptive cruise control, collision mitigation, and road departure mitigation, can increase the risk of accidents and reduce the overall safety of the vehicle.
symptoms: The warning message "Some Driver Assist Systems Cannot Operate: Radar Obstructed" appears
the BRAKE SYSTEM LIGHT illuminates
the adaptive cruise control malfunctions
the collision mitigation system faults
and the road departure mitigation system becomes inoperative.
